entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ReJITID is always zero in ILToNativeMapDCStart event #70187
  • [API Proposal]: Expose TLS details for QUIC connection #70184
  • Improve handling of reused constants in the register allocator #70182
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] `memory access out of bounds` in `System.Memory.Tests`/AOT/windows/v8 #70175
  • Creating a tar directly into a GZipStream crashes when writing final records #70172
    7.0.0
  • Proposal: Make Console.Input/OutputEncoding default to UTF-16 on Windows #70168
  • System.IO.Tests.directory_move_multiple_from_watched_to_unwatched_mac test failing #70164
  • libhostfxr.dylib fails after installing another version of .net #70163
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/28/2022 1:41:21 AM #70162
  • ConsoleLogger output is garbled with color codes when redirected #70156
  • - #70155
  • [libraries-pgo] Assertion failed '(igInLoop->igLoopBackEdge == nullptr) || (igInLoop->igLoopBackEdge == igLoopHeader)' during 'Generate code' #70152
  • ConfigurationBinder.Bind on virtual array property duplicates elements #70150
  • Unnecessary comparisons not eliminated for full range checks #70145
    Future
  • [Perf] Regressions in IndexOf #70158
  • [Perf] Regressions from flow graph reordering change #70159
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_BoostDocs_Simple #70160
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_String #70161
  • [ServiceProvider] Services registered as open generic are overwritten by closed generic registrations when ValidateOnBuild is on #70140
  • [API Proposal]: IDistributedCache overloads with ReadOnlyMemory<byte> support #70137
  • Loading a .NET host in a C++ program seems to change exception handling behavior #70136
  • [wasm][debugger] Enable onCallFrame evaluation of static fields in Default Interface Method #70135
  • build-native.sh doesn't update the shared testhost #70134
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #70133
    7.0.0
  • Comments on 'System.Convert' are obsolete #70131
  • SerialPort: continuously `TimeoutException` when write bytes first time failed. #70130
  • JsonNode serialize should respect naming policy #70129
  • CryptographicException in System.Reflection.PortableExecutable.Tests.PEBuilderTests.Checksum test #70128
  • Ctor_InvalidNames_Unix is failing on NativeAOT on Linux #70127
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Linux dwarf info is severely malformed #70125
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.Matrix3x2Tests.Matrix3x2CreateRotationCenterTest #70124
  • CreateSymbolicLink is either buggy or unnecessarily expensive #70123
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Improve the UX for using codespaces to run library tests, and debug #70122

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] GC suspension issues with System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests #70115
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.InstanceDataTests.InstanceDataCollectionCollection_CopyTo failing in CI #68291
    7.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Vector3 causes a segfault #63354
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: X509Certificate.RawSerialNumberMemory #70177
  • Some System.Data abstraction types don't properly implement disposable pattern #70049
  • JIT: checked/release diffs #70143
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Version #66995
    7.0.0
  • ModuleBuilder.GetType does not work with ignore case with certain unicode chars on Unix #18231
    7.0.0
  • `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Unit.Tests.HostAbortedExceptionTests` doesn't work on OSX #70132
  • Code example in DiagnosticSourceUsersGuide.md is outdated #49082
    7.0.0
  • ExecutionContext_NotCachedInSocketAsyncEventArgs - failure in Assert.True #1722
    7.0.0
  • Blazor MAUI Android SSL Certification failed for self-signed server #63064
    6.0.x
  • [Native AOT] LINK : fatal error LNK1102: out of memory and Failed to load type #70092
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests UseCallback_BadCertificate_ExpectedPolicyErrors failure #70121
  • Many jobs are failing with a 401 response #69854
  • native-managed HResult incompatibility #70099
  • Test failure LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests.Diagnostics.StringMarshallingForwardingNotSupported_ReportsDiagnostic #69977
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: new System.ComponentModel.DateOnlyConverter and System.ComponentModel.TimeOnlyConverter classes #68743
    7.0.0
  • .Netcore 3.1 Error using PasswordDeriveBytes.CryptDeriveKey #66460
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Enabling console logger queue length and mode to be configurable #70186
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix race condition in WASM crypto worker #70185
    area-System.Security
  • Remove complex marshalling support from crossgen2 #70183
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Bring Enum.InternalBoxEnum to C# (CoreCLR) #70181
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mop-up changes per Jakob's PR suggestions #70180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan #70179
    NO-MERGE, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Do not read position when tar archive stream is unseekable #70178
    area-System.IO
  • Use IndexOf{Any} in a few more places #70176
    area-Meta
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging wbt failures on windows #70174
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Ensure that GT_CNS_VEC is handled in LinearScan::isMatchingConstant #70171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Forbid creating layout-less `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` nodes #70170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Handle enums in box-unbox optimization #70167
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix long latencies in `ReaderWriterLockSlim` lock operations due to `Sleep(1)` #70165
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Update analyzer version and fix new findings #70157
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Properly handle trailing whitespace in the URL for the HttpClient #70154
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove unused winapi mimicking headers under PAL #70153
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Grab the default timezone using native API #70149
  • [QUIC] Buffered reads #70148
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove some dead code / branches #70146
    area-Meta
  • Safe size estimation for SymbolicRegexNode #70139
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm][debugger] Added Default Interface Method static tests. #70138
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: fix invariant analysis for cloning #70126
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add AVX2 SIMD code paths for ASCIIUtility #70120
    community-contribution

Merged

  • fix InstanceDataCollectionCollection_CopyTo by retrying on 0 values #70119
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter
  • Remove thumbprint allocation in ManagedCertificateFinder #70173
    area-System.Security
  • Delete an old quirk from `gtSetEvalOrder` #69894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix crash on osx-arm64 with Vector3 #70141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #69833
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Update updating-ref-source.md #70169
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Wasm AOT micro optimizations #69955
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Exempt MemberNotNullWhen from genapi ref assembly requirements #70113
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Tag myself on area-CodeGen-coreclr issues #70142
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Fix checked/release diff #70144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable test that already fixed #70065
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Skip HostAbortedExceptionTests when BinaryFormatter isn't supported #70151
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Enable Expression tests for NativeAOT #69945
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable flaky DNS cancellation tests during jitstress #70089
    area-System.Net
  • Move TypeReference.ToObject to managed (CoreCLR) #70055
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use key properties to determine ECC key size for Apple #70116
    area-System.Security
  • Improve DisplayNameHelpers for NativeAOT #70084
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Latest msquic interop #69876
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • More lib testing with native AOT #69132
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix build issues after enabling TRACE_GC #69766
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-preview5] Refactoring the generic-math CreateChecked/Saturating/Truncating APIs to match API review #70034
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update Roslyn to pick up recent features / bug fixes / design changes #70087
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Update test to stop expecting removed diagnostics #70106
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-bug
  • [release/7.0-preview5] Fix VTableCallHolder writeable mapping size with W^X #70103
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • Support more primitive type converters #70057
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

Updated

  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Some cleanups in Native AOT suspension area #69885
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Upgrade SDK to 7.0.100-preview.5.22276.4 #70117
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Feature/add event to minmax threads config #70063
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rooting `GT_COMMA` nodes for `GT_RETURN` nodes, then hoisting them to statements #69918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix some scaling issues with the global queue in the thread pool #69386
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Optimize Matrix4x4 Decompose with fewer stores #66351
    area-System.Numerics, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add {M}IBC to glossary #68111
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Draft for Min/Max intrinsics xarch #69434
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix address adjustment in bundle unmap for macos universal binaries #69689
    Servicing-consider, area-Single-File
  • [Mono] Add retry mechanism to test execution process #70023
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support new hot reload features #70097
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, area-EnC-mono
  • Improve Encoding.UTF8.GetMaxByte/CharCount perf #69910
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 7.0.0
  • Move Format property to TarEntry and allow multiple Global Extended Attributes entries #69933
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Delete `GT_INDEX` #69917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Handle "mis-sized" structs in XARCH `PUTARG_STK` codegen #68611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Utilize VN-based non-null knowledge better #69808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable folding of struct indirs used by returns in local morph #69947
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete a few dependencies on field sequences #69991
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Consolidate morphing of local nodes #69819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not use `LEA`s in HIR #69992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Do not rely on `GT_ADDR` in `gtFoldBoxNullable` #69961
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Enable -Werror=shorten-64-to-32 #70062
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve string.Format / {Value}StringBuilder.AppendFormat parsing throughput #69757
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Add ZipArchiveEntry.IsEncrypted for password-protection detection #70036
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Host error message updates #70059
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.7
  • [Release/6.0] Fix singlefile bundle alignment on OSX ARM64 #69930
    Servicing-approved, area-Single-File, 6.0.7
  • Update to use Mariner 2.0 as the build image #70111
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix entrypoint breakpoint when it's an async method #69856
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement get bytes from loaded_files using debugger protocol. #69072
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Modify tests to distinguish between emit- and interpreted-based invoke #70114
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Enabled null-conditional operator on EvaluateOnFrame #69307
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Cryptography.Pkcs.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70041
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] Add leg to build wasm with threading enabled #68787
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Optimize `System.Reflection.Metadata.ByteSequenceComparer`. #70047
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Initial SIMD support #70086
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement DbDataSource #70006
    area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use u8 in more places #69995
    area-Meta
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update CentOS7 image #69892
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Optimize `HashCode.AddBytes` for inputs larger than 16 bytes. #70095
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Added Default Interface Method tests. #70002
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • NativeAOT: Do not disambiguate calli thunks based on modops #70105
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Reenable 4244 warning for Mono. #70026
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Add exception interop test for validating native exception interop on Windows + CoreCLR. #70110
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
